page.title: 07Tourism
page.content: This area is one designated as outstanding natural beauty and as such many{tourists come to enjoy the {pleasure of just walking and being in {the country. }The area offers excellent horse riding facilities. The centre of Stogumber Village is protected under the{historic buildings act for its many fine old cottages dating back to 1600's. The village Church stands in the centre. Opposite is the WLhite Horse Inn and the old library which belongs to the White Horse. The whole propoerty has been carefully and thoughtfully restored. Many{artists and sketching groups are to be seen in the village throughout the year. {Photographic groups too spend a fair proportion of their time here.
